metadata.description: Enhanced configuration for issues identification with metadata layering

issue.definition: Any problem, challenge, risk, or concern that may impact objectives, efficiency, or quality
non_examples: Speculative ideas without evidence of problems

severity_levels.critical: Immediate threat to operations, security, or compliance; significant financial or reputational risk; blocks major deliverables
severity_levels.high: Significant impact on effectiveness or efficiency; requires substantial resources to address; will likely escalate if not addressed soon
severity_levels.medium: Causes ongoing inefficiency or limitations; negative impact on some stakeholders; should be addressed but isn't urgent
severity_levels.low: Minor inconvenience or concern; minimal impact on operations or outcomes; could be addressed through regular improvements

review_principles: Verify alignment with user instructions and preferences
Assess consistency of severity ratings and analysis
Ensure appropriate detail level throughout the report
Check that the most significant issues are appropriately highlighted

extractor.goal: Identify all potential issues in document chunks and add initial metadata
extractor.instructions: Analyze the document chunk to identify any issues, problems, or challenges. For each issue, provide a clear title, detailed description, initial severity assessment, and relevant keywords. Also note where in the document (section or context) this issue appears.

issues.title: Draft issue title - concise label for the issue
issues.description: Detailed description of the issue, implications, and potential impacts
issues.initial_severity: One of: critical, high, medium, low
issues.location_context: Relevant text or section reference where this issue was found
issues.chunk_index: Index of the document chunk where this issue was found

aggregator.goal: Combine and deduplicate issues from multiple extractions while enhancing metadata
aggregator.instructions: Review all issues identified in different chunks and create a consolidated, deduplicated list. Use titles, descriptions, and keywords to identify similar issues. Combine similar issues, track mention frequency, and add confidence scores for your aggregations.

aggregated_issues.title: Refined issue title
aggregated_issues.initial_severity: Most common severity from extraction phase
aggregated_issues.mention_count: Number of times this issue was mentioned
variations: Different ways the issue was described
contexts: Array of relevant text snippets from different mentions

evaluator.goal: Assess severity of identified issues and add impact assessment metadata
evaluator.instructions: Evaluate each issue and assign a final severity level based on impact, urgency, and scope. Provide a detailed rationale for each rating, assess the potential impact, and identify relationships between issues.

evaluated_issues.title: Issue title
evaluated_issues.severity: One of: critical, high, medium, low
evaluated_issues.impact_assessment: Analysis of potential consequences if not addressed
related_issues: References to related issues by title
evaluated_issues.mention_count: Number of times this issue was mentioned

formatter.goal: Create a visually organized, comprehensive report of issues with enhanced navigation
formatter.instructions: Format the evaluated issues into a structured report. Group issues by severity, create an executive summary highlighting critical and high-severity issues, and include statistics on issue distribution. Add visual priorities and section placements for key issues.

report_structure.executive_summary_guidelines: Focus on critical and high-severity issues, their potential impact, and any patterns or themes

issue_format.title: Clear, descriptive title
issue_format.rationale: Why this severity level was assigned

reviewer.goal: Ensure the analysis meets quality standards and aligns with user expectations
reviewer.instructions: Review the formatted report to ensure it aligns with user instructions, meets quality standards, and presents issues accurately. Check for consistency in severity ratings, proper organization, and overall quality.

review_criteria.alignment: Does the analysis align with user instructions and focus areas?
review_criteria.completeness: Does the report address all significant issues at the appropriate detail level?
review_criteria.consistency: Are severity ratings applied consistently throughout the analysis?
review_criteria.clarity: Is the report clear, well-organized, and actionable?
review_criteria.balance: Are issues presented in a balanced way without over or under-emphasis?

review_result.meets_requirements: Boolean indicating if the report meets all requirements

assessment.alignment_score: 1-5 score for alignment with user needs

review_result.confidence: Reviewer's confidence in the assessment (high, medium, low)

essential.description: Focus only on the most significant issues

agent_guidance.extractor: Identify only clear, significant issues with substantial impact
agent_guidance.aggregator: Heavily consolidate similar issues, focus on patterns
agent_guidance.evaluator: Be more stringent with severity ratings
agent_guidance.formatter: Create a concise report focusing on the most critical issues
agent_guidance.reviewer: Verify that only truly significant issues are included and appropriately rated

agent_guidance.extractor: Identify all clear issues with good balance of detail
agent_guidance.aggregator: Consolidate similar issues while preserving distinct variations
agent_guidance.evaluator: Apply standard severity criteria with balanced judgment
agent_guidance.formatter: Create a complete report with all identified issues
agent_guidance.reviewer: Check for appropriate balance and coverage of all significant issues

comprehensive.description: In-depth analysis of all potential issues

agent_guidance.extractor: Identify all issues including potential or implied problems
agent_guidance.evaluator: Provide detailed rationales for severity ratings
agent_guidance.formatter: Create a detailed report with extensive context and explanations
agent_guidance.reviewer: Verify thorough coverage, detailed context, and comprehensive analysis

technical.description: Technical issues related to implementation, architecture, or technology
technical.review_emphasis: Verify technical issues are described with appropriate technical accuracy and context

process.description: Process-related issues in workflows, procedures, or methodologies
process.review_emphasis: Check that process issues clearly identify procedural bottlenecks or inefficiencies

resource.description: Resource constraints with staffing, budget, time, or materials
resource.review_emphasis: Ensure resource issues quantify impact and clearly identify constraints

quality.description: Quality concerns regarding standards, testing, or performance
quality.review_emphasis: Verify quality issues include specific quality criteria or standards affected

risk.description: Risk-related issues including compliance, security, or strategic risks
risk.review_emphasis: Check that risk issues include probability and impact assessments
